about_the_game:
About the Game

" " Ethan is a hacker who got trapped in his own computer by *InkA*, an AI (artificial intelligence). He has to survive into a virtual combat world created by *THOR*, and win in order to get back to his world . "

YOUR CHALLENGE !!!


OS ROGUE is a third-person roguelike shooter where the player must face waves of enemies in the futuristic cyberpunk world by using a variety of weapons and physical abilities.

Player will unlock abilities and earn resources to become more powerful. Battles alternative between waves off robots, epic boss battles and exploration to discovers secret room.


  • *Discover Awesomes and unique levels.

  • *Epic Fight against a bunch of final boss.

  • *Use specials movements to dodge bullets .

  • *Upgrade your game experience by customizing yours weapons , health skills etc

More features will be added later...

name: OS ROGUE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7(or higher)
  • Processor: intel core i3 4th generation or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD 520 or Higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: OS ROGUE is a Ultra Dynamic roguelike shooter when you try to survive against a waves of enemy and fight a "final boss" at each floor.
